DOC.HEADLINE: REAGAN FILM FESTIVAL SLATED FOR FEBRUARY
DOC.TEXT: Cable_television ' s Turner Classic Movies channel is planning to schedule a Ronald Reagan film festival in February , with more_than 30 of the former President ' s movies on_tap . Among the films that will be shown are " King ' s Row , " " Knute Rockne , All American , " " Santa Fe Trail " and " Prisoner of War. "
